item.title: Renamed my mod of the Aeon skin to Sandbox. Added several fonts to choose from as well as main and highlighted coloring options.
Added library integration as well as Plex and PBS to the guide. Removed THX and added Quicksilver and Fork-Q.
You can exit the Pluto guide by hitting back or backspace twice. The channels do take a few seconds to load when booting Kodi.
